mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( select u.emp_no, d.dept_name, ui.name, cm.work_start, cm.work_end, NVL(to_number(trunc((work_end - work_start)*24*60)) ,0)as work_time, NVL(cm.over_work_time,0) as over_work_time, o.off_count from users u, departments d, user_info ui, commute cm, off o where d.dept_no = ui.dept_no and ui.emp_no = u.emp_no and u.id = cm.id and cm.id = o.id
and ui.name LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
and u.emp_no LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
and d.dept_name LIKE '%'||upper('${cri.keyword}')||'%'
order by u.emp_no ) t )
WHERE rn >= (#{cri.page}-1) * 10 +1 and rn <= #{cri.page} * 10

select count(*) from users u, departments d, user_info ui, commute cm, off o where d.dept_no = ui.dept_no and ui.emp_no = u.emp_no and u.id = cm.id and cm.id = o.id
and ui.name LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
and u.emp_no LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
and d.dept_name LIKE '%'||upper('${cri.keyword}')||'%'
